group_1.textLeft: These are all of the Magical Girls I could gather from Ryuugasaki.

group_1.textRight: I asked everyone to participate, but some of them wouldn't come.
Sorry about that.

group_1.textCenter: Even ten of you would have been enough. @I appreciate your efforts.

group_1.textRight: ... Are you sure I don't need to go with you...?

group_1.textLeft: I'm more worried about Ao.
She seems like she's on thin ice right now.
So I want you to keep an eye on her.
Plus, it'd be better to not have Torayamachi's Horse @show up at the meeting.

group_1.textRight: ... I understand.
Just please be careful.

group_1.textLeft: (Now's the time to show them how serious we are... @it's not about winning or losing anymore.)

group_1.textRight: Any news on the witches?

group_1.textLeft: We're still investigating the reason for their disappearance.

group_1.textRight: I heard one of your members leading the @investigation has gone missing...

group_1.textLeft: ... Yes.

group_1.textRight: You have no idea what's going to happen next, @do you?

group_1.textLeft: No, we don't...

group_1.textRight: Let me get this straight...
We've been trying to thin the numbers of Magical @Girls so we can keep living on.
And you're here to convince us that we don't have to @do that anymore, because witches are coming back. @Is that right?

group_1.textLeft: I believe that if we all work together, at least for the time being, it would probably speed up the investigation.

group_1.textRight: You know how bad things have been between you @and us. And now you want to start over with @a blank slate?
I think you're asking too much of us.

group_1.textLeft: ... I don't think the point of this meeting was to @question me like this, was it?
I say what I want to say.
You've all agreed to work with me, so we're here to @set some ground rules.
If you start picking a fight like this, the whole @meeting is pointless, isn't it?

group_1.textRight: My apologies.
But I want you to consider how these girls are feeling right now.
Our two gangs have been fighting each other for so long, it’s not that easy to suddenly start cooperating with each other.
That's why we're being cautious about it.

group_1.textLeft: ... Okay, I understand.
Alright, putting that aside for now, let's talk about @those ground rules.
That's what you're all here for, isn't it?

group_1.textRight: We need you to make something clear to us.

group_1.textLeft: Make something clear?

group_1.textRight: We've been fighting for so long, it’s hard to tell whose territory is where anymore.
So before we can join with you, I want us to clear up which territory belongs to who.

group_1.textLeft: Just... what are you getting at...?
It sounds like you're saying...
That you're only agreeing to a ceasefire if we stay @out of your territory...
Or am I overthinking it...?

group_1.textRight: I did a lot of thinking after you invited me.
I understand what you're trying to do, but I'm still @not convinced.
Maybe we can stop fighting with each other from @here on...
But no matter how hard I try, I just can't see myself working with Torayamachi.
Not only that, when I look back on everything that happened around here, all of the victims of our @fights...
The time when we decided to start hunting Kyubey...
And the time when all of Futatsugi learned how @Magical Girls became witches...
You were always there, Yuna Kureha.

group_1.textCenter: What are you girls really here for...?
